tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very calm and composed. Patiently listens to health issues or problems without interrupting. Seeks medical and family history and records the same meticulously. Explains health issue and possible course of treatment. Starts with conservative therapy. Instills confidence. Rare to find such doctors nowadays

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: very amazing doctor! she treated me really well.. highly recommend her.. but there is one small issue. its very tough to get an appointment because the hospital hardly pick the call up quickly.. can be very frustrating to wait for very long time- sometimes close to 25 mins
reply_text: Thanks for taking time to share your feedback.. Glad to know you are doing great. We'll try to sort out the appontment process snags.. thanksüëç

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Lorraine is very friendly and listen to our problems very patiently.  I have been seeing her for more than 5 years now. And my whole family consults her. she is very prompt in reverting to messages on chat box of practo which removes the anxiety while you are consulting online. once again thanks for everything. I strongly recommend Dr Lorraine.
reply_text: Thanks for sharing your feedback Smitha. We wish you and family members speedy recovery and good healthüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Lorraine is my family doctor for past 3 years, earlier used to consult at GM hospital, now at her clinic at Vijayanagar. She is one of the best doctor in town. She is friendly in nature and listen to the patients, understand and diagnose. Her medication always works. Thank you so much Dr. Lorraine.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback. Hope all are fine and safe during these tough times

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Lorraine Ma‚Äôam explains in detail about the existing condition and always replies back patiently. Both my parents were Covid affected and ma‚Äôam guided us throughout never even tiring once to answer our queries. One of the most experienced doctor with immense knowledge. We sailed through the storm of covid 19 thanks to the doctor üòä
reply_text:
The covid battle has to be fought by the patient, their family n friends and the doctor as a team. I was in awe of the courage shown by your parents and yourselves. Truly elated by your parents recovery. 
Stay safe and healthyüëçüò∑

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She treated my husband gowtham when he had dengue fever when she worked in GM hospital.
He is very allergic to many drugs.
She personally monitored and wrote medications which didn't have any side effects.
Best part is she is very sweet and gives confidence to patients.
She takes extra care of patients. 
Her medications always give good results.
I believe her a lot.
reply_text: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience and reinterating your confidence in my treatment. Hope all of you are in good healthüëç

reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback sir. Very glad to know you have recovered . Wishing good health to you and your family.üò∑

review:
